KIDS

We have made sure there are lots of activities to keep the children entertained as well as the music. Everything for kids is free and unlimited thanks to a very generous Hoodstock donor.

Bouncy Castle

Local company ‘So So Soft Play’ are bringing over a bouncy castle, bouncy slide and soft play for the little ones.

Face Painting

Westfield based Fantasy Face painting will be coming to the festival between 3pm and 5pm.

School of Rock

We will have a dedicated musical play area for kids to try out instruments and make their own music!

Craft Tent

There will be a whole host of glitter and glue for kids to take a break and make something awesome to take home.

HOODSTOCK is a private, not for profit event. All attendees must register via Eventbrite. Questions? Email contact@hoodstock.rocks.
